item.title: about-me
item.description: knitr::include_graphics(rep(“static/img/me-rox.png”)) knitr::include_graphics(rep(“static/img/bronson-rox.png”)) My name is Lauryn Burleigh. I am the creator of the Between The Lobes site. I have a border-collie/lab mix named Roxy and an american pitbull terrier named Bronson, who are both pictured above. I also have two rabbits, Cal and Moo. I am a graduate student in Dr. Steven Greening’s Cognitive Neuroscience of Affect and Psychopathology Lab (CNAPs Lab) at Louisiana State University in Baton Rouge, LA.
